### Title
Summary and Feedback of Request for Information (RFI) for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) Pistol Modernization Project

### Reference No. and Solicitation No.
PW-__BM-039-29080
M7594-224467/E

### Publication Date
2023-06-01

### Closing Date and Time for Bidders
2023-06-16T14:00:00

### Procurement Overview
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is soliciting information from suppliers in regards to the modernization of its service pistol. The current pistol has exceeded its lifespan, and the RCMP is looking to acquire a new, modern service pistol with reduced trigger pull weight, various frame sizes, and decreased overall weight.

To enhance officer and public safety, the RCMP has also identified the need for a pistol-mounted flashlight and a Red Dot Sight (RDS). These features are intended to improve officer shooting accuracy, reduce response times, and allow officers focus on threats.
